amendment.description: Amendment sought to change the language in the bill regarding the elimination of water for the delta environment and sought to preserve senior water rights in Northern California.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 113-340 to explain that Section 107 will not suspend `b2' water (800,000 acre feet) that was allocated in the 1992 Central Valley Project Improvement Act. Senior water rights holders in the Delta or north of Delta shall not be responsible for the project yield allocation or B2 water.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Matsui amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 228 (Roll no. 43).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Matsui amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 228 (Roll no. 43).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Matsui.
